note:
AssetTrackr is one of the best telematics companies in India. AssetTrackr offers solutions to track both mobile and fixed assets. AssetTrackr applications include Fleet Management with GPS vehicle tracking, Fuel Monitoring, Tyre Pressure Monitoring etc.
AssetTrackr was acquired by WABCO Holdings Inc. in 2017, a leading global supplier of technologies and services that improve the safety, efficiency and connectivity of commercial vehicles

name: Fleet Management System
value: Real-time vehicle tracking with alerts on over speeding, idling

name: Fuel Monitoring Solution
value: Fuel tracking with ultrasonic fuel sensors. Get alerts on fuel consumption and fuel theft

name: Tyre Pressure Monitoring Solution
value: TPMS provides fuel efficiency,Vehicle safety and prolong tyre life.

name: Cold Chain Monitoring Solution
value: Real-time monitoring of temperature and humidity in reefer vehicles
